itunes:title: #73: Processing of Post-Election Disappointment in Supposed Allies
title: #73: Processing of Post-Election Disappointment in Supposed Allies
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, I process my post election disappointment in supposed allies and how I'm coping with that.  For more tips on coping, look at episode #52: Healing Our Unavailable Relationship with Whiteness.  GRAB A BLACK FRIDAY BUNDLE ...
itunes:summary:
In this episode, I process my post election disappointment in supposed allies and how I'm coping with that. 

For more tips on coping, look at episode #52: Healing Our Unavailable Relationship with Whiteness.
